name: Inca Quarry Trek 4D/3N
description: Take an alternative trek in the beautiful Sacred Valley of the Incas less traveled and seen by few tourists.  See interesting sites including an unfinished Incan Quarry and ceremonial sites on your way to Machu Picchu, one of the 7 Modern Wonders of the World.  This is a good aternative trek when the Inca Trail is full.
